00029 #include "HeartFileFinder.hpp"
00030 
00031 
00032 HeartFileFinder::HeartFileFinder(const cp::path_type& rPath)
00033 {
00034     std::string relative_path(rPath);
00035     RelativeTo::Value relative_to;
00036     switch (rPath.relative_to())
00037     {
00038         case cp::relative_to_type::cwd:
00039             relative_to = RelativeTo::CWD;
00040             break;
00041         case cp::relative_to_type::chaste_test_output:
00042             relative_to = RelativeTo::ChasteTestOutput;
00043             break;
00044         case cp::relative_to_type::chaste_source_root:
00045             relative_to = RelativeTo::ChasteSourceRoot;
00046             break;
00047         case cp::relative_to_type::absolute:
00048             relative_to = RelativeTo::Absolute;
00049             break;
00050         default:
00051             NEVER_REACHED;
00052             break;
00053     }
00054     SetPath(relative_path, relative_to);
00055 }
